replies.text: Welcome to the Phone Skill! You can ask me to start phone calls for you.
replies.speak: Welcome to the Phone Skill! You can ask me to start phone calls for you.

replies.text: You can ask me to call a phone number or one of your contacts.
replies.speak: You can ask me to call a phone number or one of your contacts.

replies.text: This feature is not yet available in this skill. Please try asking something else.
replies.speak: This feature is not yet available in this skill. Please try asking something else.

replies.text: What can I help you with today?
replies.speak: What can I help you with today?

replies.text: What can I do for you?
replies.speak: What can I do for you?

replies.text: Is there anything I can do for you?
replies.speak: Is there anything I can do for you?

replies.text: I'm here if you need anything else.
replies.speak: I'm here if you need anything else.

replies.text: Let me know if there's anything else you need.
replies.speak: Let me know if there's anything else you need.

replies.text: Let me know if I can help you with anything else.
replies.speak: Let me know if I can help you with anything else.

replies.text: All done. Let me know if I can do anything else.
replies.speak: All done. Let me know if I can do anything else.
